data.title: James Blunt Quitting Music Biz
data.meta_description:
As far as the article, and his answers...it's sort of ambiguous. Anyway...is he right to get out now while the gettin's good?

James Blunt quitting...

#3

Fine by me, His voice sucked in my opinion, and his hit is about whining about some hot chick he's afraid to talk to ... MAN THE F*CK UP! buddy boy.

and that riff sounded like the sad walking away music from the incredible hulk.

so basically, i'm cool with it, i hope he enjoys his decision and lives a long happy life doing what makes him happy.
